Description: MIJ, made in japan, Gibson, Lespaul, White, SG, Höfner, Duesenberg, Ibanez, ATELIER Z, ARIA, ESP, Caparison, Killer, COMBAT GUITARS, GUYATONE, Greco, Sugi Guitars, TEISCO, DEVISERA, Nil, Bacchus, VANZANDT, Fernandes, Fender Japan, Fujigen, MOON GUITARS, momose, Yairi Guitar, YAMAHA, TOKAI, Zemaitis, VOX, B, C, Rich, Epiphone, Gibson, Gretsch, Suhr, Schecter, Charvel, Jackson, Dean, Tom Anderson, Fender, Paul Reed Smith, Melancon, Mosrite, Rickenbacker, Robert Benedetto, Washburn, Ibanez, kramer, EDWARDS, Burny, Grassroots, 2006 Burny(FERNANDES) RLC-55JS John Sykes model ~ Upgraded to Duncan ~Very Good+ ConditionMade in China Down from here. To make it easy to understand the condition of the scratches, I lighted the light strongly. 2006 Burny(FERNANDES) RLC-55JS John Sykes model ~ Upgraded to Duncan ~Very Good+ ConditionMade in China Body Maple Top, Mahogany Back. Neck Mahogany. Scale 22F. 24.75inch (628mm), Gibson Medium Scale. Nut Width About 1.69inch (43mm). Pickup Neck : FVH-2002. Bridge : Seymour Duncan SH-4. Control 2Volume, 2Tone, 3Way Toggle-SW. Bridge Tune O Machic Stop Tailpiece. Machine heads Burny Original. Color Black. Weight About 7.65pound ( 3.47Kg ) This is Used Guitar. Strap pins has been changed to lock type. Bridge pickup has been changed to Seymour Duncan SH-4. Partially touch up painted. Mirror pick guard is lost. There are scratches and dents. But fatal damage is not. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. I examined my sales history in the past. I last time sold the same model in December 2016. It is about 1 year and 9 months ago. I spent a long time to get RLC-55JS. This RLC-55JS is made in china, but very popular in japan. I think that state that the pick guard was removed is very good-looking. Parts unified with silver color are very cool. The former owner would have precious this. As a against noise, aluminum tape is very carefully affixed in control cavity. And, the amount of Frets is so many. This is not made in japan, but I think that making is very polite. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is very narrow. Thanks to that, I feel very easy to play the guitar. Mounted the Duncan SH-4 Pickup in Bridge. It gives very good distortion sound. Remaining amount of the Frets is so many. Therefore can be use from now to long term. Fernandes Burny is great. It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining Frets are 95% ! You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. Guitar playing, is comfortable. All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included. GIG BAG Included. Look at the photos, please verify by yourself! It will be professionally pack. Double air packing.
